description.desc1: Blends color textures with softedge textures

enable.descript: enable texture shader pass. the outlet that appears below will output the resulting texture.

ouput.descript:
output mode: 
	<li>result shows the final blend 
	<li>texture one shows the color texture 
	<li>texture two shows the blend texture

Notes.note1: this node can be used as a shader of as a texture shader pass.

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
